'''Harmonious Reed Pipes''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Fontaine]]. It is a puzzle involving various pipes with a number indicated overhead, and the pipes must be rang using [[Dew Bubble]]s in the order of those numbers. If multiple pipes have the same number, then those pipes must be rang at the same time.

They are encountered during the {{Quest|Foggy Forest Path (Quest)}}.
